learning_objectives: Understand the fundamentals of Data Discretization Technology

sections.background: This technology can convert continuous attributes into discrete attribute values, reducing the number of attribute values, thereby reducing the computing time for processing data

metadata.concept_definition: This technology can convert continuous attributes into discrete attribute values, reducing the number of attribute values, thereby reducing the computing time for processing data
